S04bsu019_u:8: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:30: anye ca dvātriṃśaddevanikāyā devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitā maheśvaranārāyaṇadevaputrapūrvaṃgamāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:31: śakro devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiścandrādityavāyuvaruṇādayo devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitāstasmin parṣadi /
S04bsu019_u:71: evaṃpramukhāṇi anekāni kinnararājaśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni tasmin parṣadi /
S04bsu019_u:125: evaṃpramukhāṇyanekāni nāgakanyā śatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni tasmin parṣadi /
S04bsu019_u:232: yadā mahāsaṃnipātaścābhūta, tadā avīcau mahānarake raśmayo niścaranti sma /
S04bsu019_u:234: sarve te vihārapariśobhitā eva dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:235: divyamaṇiratnopalitpāḥ [Vaidya_261] stambhāḥ pariśobhitā eva dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:237: layane layane suvarṇarūpyamayāni dvārāṇi dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:238: layane layane suvarṇarūpyamayāni sopānāni dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:239: suvarṇarūpyamayāni prāsādāni, rūpyamaye prāsāde suvarṇamayāni stambhāni divyaratnopacitāni /
S04bsu019_u:242: bahirjetavanasya purata udyāne nānāvidhāni kalpavṛkṣāṇi dṛśyante sma /

S04bsu019_u:251: tasminneva jetavanavihāre vajramayāṇi sopānāni dṛśyante sma,

S04bsu019_u:265_0: atha tasminneva parṣanmadhye sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu019_u:265_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu019_u:266: kuta ime raśmayaḥ samāgacchanti sma? kasyaiṣa tathāgatasya viṣayaprabhāvaḥ? iti /
S04bsu019_u:268: kulaputro 'vīcau mahānarake āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:271: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - bhagavan,
S04bsu019_u:274: tatrāsya dharmaṃ deśayati - yasyāḥ kuḍyaprākāraparyantā ayomayī bhūmiḥ samanantaraprajvalitaikajvālībhūtā,
S04bsu019_u:278: yathā bahvayudakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ mudgā vā māṣā vā cordhvaṃ gacchanto 'dho gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante,
S04bsu019_u:279: evaṃ te sattvā [Vaidya_262] avīcau mahānarake kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:280: tatkathaṃ bhagavan avīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviśati?
S04bsu019_u:281: bhagavānāha - yathā kulaputra rājā cakravartī divyaratnamayodyāne praviśati mahatyā cakravartirājyasamṛddhayā,
S04bsu019_u:282: evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminnavīcau mahānarake praviśati /
S04bsu019_u:285: tadā te yamapālapurūṣāḥ saṃvegacittāḥ paramodvignāścintāṃ samāpadyante - kimasminnavīcau mahānarake 'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam?
S04bsu019_u:290: atha te yamapālapurūṣā asimusalabhindipālatomaragadācakratriśūlādīnupasaṃgṛhya sarvaṃ cāvīcipariṣkāraṃ gṛhītvā yena sa yamo dharmarājastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:291: upasaṃkramya yamaṃ dharmarājametadavocan - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam - sā cāsmākaṃ karmabhūmirniravaśeṣaṃ parikṣīṇā abhiramaṇīyā saṃvṛttā sarvasukhasamarpitā /
S04bsu019_u:292: yamo dharmarājastānuvāca - kiṃkāraṇaṃ yuṣmākamapi karmabhūmiḥ parikṣīṇā?
S04bsu019_u:294: yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam - tasminnavīcimahānarake 'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam /
S04bsu019_u:296: kāmarūpī ca tatra puruṣaḥ praviṣṭo jaṭāmukuṭadharo divyālaṃkārabhūṣitaśarīraḥ paramamaitramānasaḥ suvarṇabimbamiva dṛśyate /
S04bsu019_u:301: atha sa yamo dharmarājaścintāmāpede - kasya punardevasyāyaṃ prabhāvaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:304: athavā anyeṣāṃ maharddhikadevaputrāṇāmapi varapradānenedṛśaṃ phalaviśeṣaṃ saṃvṛttam?
S04bsu019_u:308: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokya tacca devanikāyena paśyati sma - īdṛśaṃ varaṃ kasyānyasya?
S04bsu019_u:309: atha sa punarevāvīcau mahānarake vyavalokayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:310: vyavalokya tasminnevāvīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvameva paśyati sma //
S04bsu019_u:311: atha sa yamo dharmarājo yenāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:312: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:371: evaṃ yamo dharmarājo viśeṣataraṃ srotāvadhānaṃ kṛtvā punarapi yamo dharmarājaḥ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrānto 'bhūt //
S04bsu019_u:376: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kadā bhagavannāgacchati avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:377: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avīcīmahānarakānniṣkramya pretanagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:378: tatrānekāni pretaśatasahasrāṇi purastāddhāvanti sma dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthiyantravaducchritaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīcchidropamamukhaiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:382: sa ca dvārapālapurūṣa udbaddhabhiṇḍipālaḥ kālakūṭavyagrahasto lohitākṣaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:383: satatamasyānubhāvena maitracittaṃ saṃbhāvayati - na ca me īdṛśena karmabhūminā kṛtyam //
S04bsu019_u:384: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ ca sattvanikāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahākaruṇācittamutpādya daśabhyo hastāṅgulībhyo daśa vaitaraṇīrniṣkrāmayati /
S04bsu019_u:386: atikaruṇābhibhūtacetasā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya teṣāṃ sattvānāmantike sarvaromakūpebhyo 'ṣṭāṅgavāriparipūrṇā mahānadyo niṣkrāmanti /
S04bsu019_u:391: tadā mānuṣikīṃ cetanāmupādāyaiva sāṃsārikīṃ cintāṃ vicintayanti - aho bata te jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ sukhitāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:393: sukhitāste jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā [Vaidya_264] ye mātāpitarau satataṃ parigrahamupasthānaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu019_u:394: sukhitāste satpuruṣā ye kalyāṇamitraṃ satatasamitamanveṣayanti, parigrahaṃ paripālayanti /
S04bsu019_u:395: te satpurūṣāḥ sacetanā ye mahāyānaṃ satatasamitamavagāhayanti /
S04bsu019_u:396: te satpuruṣā ye āryāstān gomārgāya vāsamupavasanti /
S04bsu019_u:398: te satpuruṣāḥ ye truṭitasphuṭitān vihārān pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti, pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
S04bsu019_u:399: te satpuruṣā ye pūrvikāni stūpabimbāni truṭitasphuṭitāni viśīrṇabhūtāni pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu019_u:400: te satpuruṣā ye dharmabhāṇakāṃllekhakān dhārakān vācakān sūtrarājasya śrāvakān satatasamitaṃ parisevanti copatiṣṭhanti ca /
S04bsu019_u:401: te satpurūṣā ye tathāgataprātihāryāṇi vividhāni ca tathāgatacaṃkramaṇāni dharmasarāṇi ca paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:404: te satpuruṣā ye bodhisattvavikurvitāni caṃkramaṇāni paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:405: ityevaṃ te pretaviṣayaṃ śarīramanuvicintya mānasānāṃ kāmānāmabhāvopapattiṃ prati parityajanti /
S04bsu019_u:407: tadā teṣāṃ viṃśatiśikhara samudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ ākāṅkṣitamukhā nāma bodhisattvā upapannāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:408: athāvalokiteśvaro yadā te sattvadhātavaḥ parimokṣitāḥ suparimuktāśca,
S04bsu019_u:419: nāsti kulaputra īdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ tathāgatānāmapi yādṛśamāryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu019_u:420: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha - kena prakāreṇa bhagavan?
S04bsu019_u:421_0: bhagavānāha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S04bsu019_u:421_1: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S04bsu019_u:421_2: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:422: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaniṣkambhin sugandhamukho nāma vaṇikputro 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:423: tadā me śrutā vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā //
S04bsu019_u:424: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā śrutā?
S04bsu019_u:427: yādṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā //
S04bsu019_u:437: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maheśvaraṃ devaputrametadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ kaliyuge pratipanne /
S04bsu019_u:441: Kvyu_1,4.1 ākāśaṃ liṅgamityāhuḥ pṛthivī tasya pīṭhikā /
S04bsu019_u:443: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā //
S04bsu019_u:444: tadapyatikramya śikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:445: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:446: tasya śikhinastathāgatasya sakāśādavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsatvasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā //
S04bsu019_u:451: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī bhagavaṃstvayā guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya śrutā?
S04bsu019_u:452: bhagavānāha - yadā sarvadevā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā rākṣasā asurā maruto garūḍā gandharvāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā abhūvan, tadā bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:453: mahāsaṃnipātaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāsāṃ parṣadāṃ madhye dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:454: tadā bhagavato mukhadvārānnānāvarṇā anekaraśmayo niḥsaranti sma /
S04bsu019_u:456: niścaritvā ca daśadigvidikṣu sarvān lokān dhātunavabhāsya punarevāgatya taṃ śikhinaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mukhadvāre praviṣṭāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:462_0: atha tasminneva parṣadi ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu019_u:462_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu019_u:464: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaraḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorāgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:465: tasya āgacchamānasyedaṃ mayedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ darśitam //
S04bsu019_u:466: atha ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattva āha - kīdṛśāni tāni nimittāni? darśayatu bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:467: bhagavānāha - yadā kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:479: tadyathā - hastiratnaṃ maniratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu019_u:482: yadā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorniṣkrāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:484: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kasya nimittāni bhagavan?
S04bsu019_u:485: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra āryāvalokiteśvaro mahāsattvo bodhisattva āgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:487: yadā sa calati tadā manoramaṃ padmavarṣaḥ patati /
S04bsu019_u:488: tadā avalokiteśvaro sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇadaṇḍāni vaidūryanirbhāsāni gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:489: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavatastāni padmānyupanāmayati sma - imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prahitāni /
S04bsu019_u:490: sa tathāgataḥ pṛcchati anātaṅkatāṃ laghutāṃ sukhasparśavihāritāṃ ca /
S04bsu019_u:491: tato bhagavatā padmāni gṛhītvā vāmapārśve sthāpitāni /
S04bsu019_u:492: tadā aryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ kurute - kīdṛśī tvayā avalokiteśvara karmabhūmirniṣpāditā sadā preteṣu avīcāvupapanneṣu?
S04bsu019_u:499: mahānarake ye upapannāḥ sattvāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mayā sattvaparipāko me kṛtaḥ kartavyaśca /
S04bsu019_u:500: kṛtvā sarve ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:502: yāvatsamantāddaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvākṣaṇopapannāḥ sattvā arūpaviśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyuḥ //
S04bsu019_u:503: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṃ praśnavyāhāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:510: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paripṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavan praśnavyāharaṇamuddeśam - kidṛśo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ?
S04bsu019_u:512: nirdeśayāmi asyāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇāt puṇyasaṃbhārasya pramāṇam /
S04bsu019_u:513_0: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra kecideva sattvā gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ
S04bsu019_u:517: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa caturmahādvīpeṣu rātriṃdivamavicchinnaṃ devo varṣati,
S04bsu019_u:519: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyaṃ mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:524: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:525: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu ye keciccatuṣpādā siṃhavyāghraṛkṣatarakṣumṛgoṣṭraśṛgālādayo gogardabhāḥ paśavaḥ hastino 'śvā mahiṣā mārjārādayaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:526: eteṣu catuṣpadeṣu śakyate mayaikaikaṃ romaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:527: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:528: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā paramāṇurajopamāstathāgatā arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā divyasauvarṇaratnamayān stūpān kārayeddhastaśatasahasrapramāṇam,
S04bsu019_u:530: tacchakyaṃ mayā kulaputra teṣāṃ sauvarṇarajatamayānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ karaṇeṣu puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:531: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:532: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikaṃ patrāṇi gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:533: na tvavalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:534: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikāste sarve srotāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabodhau niyojayeyam /
S04bsu019_u:535: yaścaiteṣu puṇyaskandhaḥ, avalokiteśvarasya pūrvavadbālagre sa puṇyaskandhaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:540: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - na me bhagavana kvacidīdṛśaḥ acintyastathāgatānāṃ puṇyaskandho dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtasya,
S04bsu019_u:542: bhagavānāha - yatkhalu kulaputra mama sadṛśāḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu019_u:544: te ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sarvathaikatra saṃnipātyante /
S04bsu019_u:545: sarve avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śankuvanti puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:546: prāgeva kulaputra ahamekākī asmin lokadhātau viharāmi,
S04bsu019_u:547: tatkathaṃ śaknuyāṃ tasya puṇyaskandhaṃ vācā vyāhartum?
S04bsu019_u:548: api ca kulaputra sarve tathāgatā daśabhyo vāgbhiḥ evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta - te sattvāḥ sukhitā loke bhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:552: te śuklapāṇḍarapaṭā iva rājahaṃsāḥ plutavāyuvegā iva gacchanti sukhāvatīlokadhātumamitābhasya tathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu019_u:553: dharmaṃ śrutvā ca sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ teṣāṃ kāye na bādhate,
S04bsu019_u:555: na ca teṣāṃ kṣutpipāsā duḥkhaṃ kāye na bādhate,
S04bsu019_u:558: dharmarasena pūryamāṇāḥ satataparigrahaṃ vyavasthāpitāḥ tāvadasmiṃllokadhātau tiṣṭhanti,
S04bsu019_u:559: yāvadavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya dṛḍhapratijñā na paripūritā bhavati - sarvasattvā sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimokṣitāḥ yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti //
S04bsu019_u:560: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamena kālena bhagavato 'sya dṛḍhapratijñāṃ paripūrayati,
S04bsu019_u:562: bhagavānāha - bahubhiḥ kulaputra kāraṇaiḥ sattvāḥ kāraṇāt saṃsāre saṃsaranti,
S04bsu019_u:565: yena yena rupeṇa vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ, tena tena rupeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu019_u:586: yathā yathā vaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā tathā [Vaidya_269] rūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu019_u:587: evaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu019_u:594: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paramāścaryādbhutaprāpto 'haṃ bhagavan /
S04bsu019_u:595: na ca me kadācidasmābhirīdṛśo viṣayo dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā,
S04bsu019_u:598: bhagavānāha - asti kulaputra asminneva jambudvīpe vajrakukṣirnāma guhā /
S04bsu019_u:600: tatra kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo 'surarūpeṇāsurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu019_u:602: dharmaśravaṇāyāgatānasurānevaṃ ca kathayati sma - asurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:603: ye cānye 'suraparṣadaste maitracittāḥ śāntacittāḥ dayācittāḥ sattvānāmantike hitasukhacittā bhāvaṃ samanvāhṛtya imaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrotavyam //
S04bsu019_u:604: atha te 'surāḥ kṛtakarapuṭā avalokiteśvarasyāntikamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:605: te sukhitā loke ye īdṛśaṃ cintāmaṇisadṛśaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājamabhimukhīkurvanti,
S04bsu019_u:618: teṣāṃ ca pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṣapayanti, kṣapayitvā pariśuddhakāyā bhaviṣyanti, jātismarāśca /
S04bsu019_u:620: te ca sarve tathāgatā āśvāsayiṣyanti - mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra,
S04bsu019_u:623: tatra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau tavārthe vicitraṃ ca te chatraṃ sihāsanaṃ sajjīkṛtam,
S04bsu019_u:626: evaṃ sa ratnapāṇe prativiśiṣṭataraṃ puṇyaphalaṃ darśayannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirvāṇikīṃ bhūmimupadarśayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:628: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:633: athe sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - atidurlabhaṃ bhagavan asyāvalokiteśvarasya vikurvitāni śrūyante guṇodbhāvanāni ca /
S04bsu019_u:634: bhagavānāha - api ca kulaputra tasmād [Vaidya_270] vajrakukṣeryadā niṣkrāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:638_0: tadapi samatikramya viśvabhūrnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu019_u:638_1: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:639: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūt girigahvarāntarakarvaṭasthānavāsī,
S04bsu019_u:641: tadā kālānukālaṃ mayā tasya viśvabhuvaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā vividhasarvasattvaparipācanam /
S04bsu019_u:642_0: asti sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin sā kāñcanamayī nāma bhūmirasti yaduttarasyāṃ kāñcanamayyāṃ
S04bsu019_u:642_1: bhūmyāṃ gatvā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhomukhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:644: sa tataḥ kāñcanamayyā bhūmyā niṣkramitvā rūpyamayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ praviśati /
S04bsu019_u:645: tatra sa paśyati catuṣpādikāni sattvāni puruṣapudgalāni /
S04bsu019_u:646_0: dṛṣṭvā teṣāmavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānāmeva dharmaṃ deśayati
S04bsu019_u:646_1: - śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ sarve puruṣapudgalā abhimukhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pracalamānasucetasā nirvāṇikam /
S04bsu019_u:648: athe te sarve puruṣā avalokiteśvarasya purataḥ sthitvā etadavocat - āśvāsaya tvam /
S04bsu019_u:651: aśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ mātāpitṛbhūto bhava /
S04bsu019_u:655: sukhitāste sattvā ye tava satataṃ parigrahaṃ nāmamanusmaranti, udīrayanti ca /
S04bsu019_u:656: idaṃ ca samāgāḍhataraṃ duḥkhaṃ na kadācitpratyanubhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:657: muñcanti te hīdṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ yāvadyādṛśaṃ vayaṃ pratyanubhavāmaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:658: atha sa teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nama mahāyanasūtraratnarājaṃ karṇapuṭe niścārayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:659: te ca sattvā amuṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā anyonyavihitaśrotṛkarṇapuṭā niścaranti sma /
S04bsu019_u:660: tadapi te puruṣāḥ śrutvā avaivartikabhūminiṣpāditāḥ paramasukhasamarpitāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:661_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyā rūpamayyā niṣkramyānyatarāyāṃ
S04bsu019_u:661_1: bhūmyāṃ praviśati sattvaparipākāya mahākaruṇāsaṃpīḍitahṛdayo 'yomayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ yatra
S04bsu019_u:663: upasaṃkramya ca rājño balerasurendrasya dūrataścakṣurdarśanaṃ yāti sma suvarṇabimbamiva raśmibhiḥ pramuñcamānairnānāvarṇaiḥ //
S04bsu019_u:668: atha sa rājā balirasurendro 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ paśyati sma /
S04bsu019_u:669_1: sahasraparivārairgatvā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādayornipatyedamudānayati sma -
S04bsu019_u:670: Kvyu_1,11.1 adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ puṇyameva ca /
S04bsu019_u:671: adya me hīdṛśaṃ caiva paripūrṇaṃ manoratham //
S04bsu019_u:672: Kvyu_1,11.2 adya me āśayaḥ pūrṇaḥ pariśuddhaśca duḥkhataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:674: Kvyu_1,11.3 tadā me sarvasaukhyaṃ ca kāme saṃtiṣṭhate punaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:679: atha sa rājā balistasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya ratnapīṭhakaṃ dattvā daśanakhāñjaliṃ kṛtvaivamāha -
S04bsu019_u:684: pāparatānāṃ jātyandhabhūtānāṃ paradāragamanaprasaktānāṃ prāṇātipātodyuktānāṃ paraprāṇāhiṃsakānāṃ jarāmaraṇabhayabhītānāmudvignamānasānāṃ saṃsāraduṣṭavārtānāṃ trātā bhava /
S04bsu019_u:688: eṣāmasmākaṃ bandhanabaddhānāṃ tava darśanena sarvabandhanādayaḥ parimuktāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:690: tvaddarśanamātreṇa yāni tāni rājñaścakravartinaśca śubhakarmajātāni cakravartisukhāni mama saṃvidyante,
S04bsu019_u:693: na ca punarimāni yāni sarvabandhanāni cakṣuṣu ābhāsamāgaccheyuḥ //
S04bsu019_u:694: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha - ye mahārāja sattvānāmantike avihiṃsācittamutpādayanti,
S04bsu019_u:697: na ca teṣāṃ kecitsattvāḥ svapnenāpi pīḍayanti /
S04bsu019_u:703: teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāmasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakānāṃ vācakānāṃ lekhakānāṃ saṃśrāvakāṇām,
S04bsu019_u:704: asya ca tathāgatasya dharmaparyāyamuddiśya ekadivasamapi purobhaktamapi piṇḍapātramanupradāsyati,
S04bsu019_u:711: tasya ca bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ saṃmukhaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyanti /
S04bsu019_u:714: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ye tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tiṣṭhataḥ parinirvṛtasya vā piṇḍapātramanuprayacchanti,
S04bsu019_u:716: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra [Vaidya_272] dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamā mama sadṛśā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu019_u:718: te 'pi sarve samagrībhūtā na śakyante ekasya piṇḍaprātrapradānasya kuśalamūlasaṃbhārasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:720: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
S04bsu019_u:721: na tu kulaputra śakyaṃ mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:722: tadyathāpi nama kulaputra caturṣu mahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaste sarve kṛṣikarmānte udyuktā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu019_u:727: sarve te strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ pīṭhakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ sarve te mardayitvā tasmin mahākhalake mahāntaṃ rāśiṃ kuryāt /
S04bsu019_u:730: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:731: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi adhastādupagataḥ ūrdhveṇa caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyucchrayeṇa ca /
S04bsu019_u:734: ye caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ puruṣadārakadārikāste ca sarve lekhakā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu019_u:737: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:738: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra lekhakāḥ sarve te daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ paryāpannāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:739: yacca teṣāṃ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ tamekasya piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:740: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra gaṅgāyā nadyā vālukāsamudrasya ca śakyaṃ mayā ekaikaṃ vālukāṃ gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:741: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:742: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā sarvamaturāsrāṃ(?) pramāṇamudgrahītum /
S04bsu019_u:743: na śakyaṃ mayā kulaputra piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum //
S04bsu019_u:744_0: atha balisurendraḥ idaṃ ca tasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasyāntikātpiṇḍapātrakuśalabhūtasya
S04bsu019_u:744_2: gadgadakaṇṭhaḥ bāṣpaparipūrṇa ucchvasan avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat
S04bsu019_u:744_3: - kīdṛśaṃ mayā bhagavan balinā karma kṛtaṃ dānaṃ dattam,
S04bsu019_u:746: sāntaḥ - puraparivāreṇa kukṣetre mayā dānaṃ dattam /
S04bsu019_u:750: yadā mayā ca bhagavan tairthikadṛṣṭiparyāpannena mānagrastamānasena ca yajñaṃ yajatā mahādānasamucchrayaṃ kartumārabdham,
S04bsu019_u:751: tadā me tatra yajñe vāmanakarūpeṇa yācanako hiṃsraḥ samāgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:752_0: tasya me maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmāni ratnābharaṇāni hyaśvarathādīni muktvā ratnakavacāni
S04bsu019_u:753: kapilāsahasrāṇi rūpyapādāni sauvarṇaśṛṅgāni muktājālapralambitāni muktikājālapraticchannāni arghapātrasamāyuktāni nānāvicitraghaṇṭāratnasamāyuktāni,
S04bsu019_u:755_0: kumārīṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi paramayā gurvaruṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatānāṃ nānāvicitrāṇāṃ
S04bsu019_u:761: anekāni suvarṇarūpyamayāni daṇḍāni ratnasaṃyuktāni satataṃ vyavasthāpitāni /
S04bsu019_u:765: tasmin sa mayā rājñā śatasahasrān saṃnipatitān brāhmaṇaśatasahasraṃ saṃnipatitam /
S04bsu019_u:767: tadāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ sthānasthitānāṃ yathāsaṃnipatitānāṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayamāpannaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:770: etatpaurvikaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi - kṣātriyabhāryāṇāṃ gurviṇīnāṃ yāvaddhṛdayaṃ sphuṭayitvā kumārakumārikā jīvitādvayaparopitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:771: tataste ca mahākṣatriyāḥ sarve mayā haḍanigaḍabandhanairbaddhāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:772: nītvā tāmraguhāyāmanekāni kṣatriyaśatasahasrāṇi pañcabandhanabaddhāni kṛtvā sthāpitāni pañcapāṇḍavaprabhṛtīni /
S04bsu019_u:773: tasyāmeva yakṣaguhāyāmupayamāni kīlakāni śṛṅkhalāsamāyuktāni teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hastapādāni baddhvā sthāpitāni /
S04bsu019_u:783: ekaikadvāre pañca pañca śatāni kapāṭāni yantrasamāyuktāni /
S04bsu019_u:791: rūpaṃ kṛtvā dine dine mṛgapakṣyādinā nānājanturūpeṇa /
S04bsu019_u:794: tadātra me daśarathaputreṇāvatāraprekṣiṇā gatvā tena dvārasthāpitāḥ sapta parvatā utpāṭitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:795: utpāṭayitvā laghunīvānyapradeśe chorayitvā uccaiḥśabdena teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāmārocayati [Vaidya_274] sma yudhiṣṭhiranakulasahadevabhīmasenārjunakauravādibhiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:796: anye rājānaḥ śabdamanuśrutaṃ śrutvā samāśvāsya svasthakāyā vyavasthitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:797: sa ca tānevamāha - jīvanto yuṣmākamathavā mṛtāḥ? te kathayanti - jīvāmo bhagavan /
S04bsu019_u:798: tena mahāvīryeṇa puruṣeṇa sarvāṇi tāni dvārāṇi bhagnāni /
S04bsu019_u:799: yāvattāmraguhāyāṃ paśyati, sarve te rājāno bandhanabaddhāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:800: dṛṣṭvā ca nārāyaṇaṃ sarve te parasparaṃ vicintayanti - atha balirasurendro mṛtaḥ kālagataḥ?
S04bsu019_u:802: atha te kathayanti - varamasmākaṃ saṃgrāmabhūmīmaraṇaṃ na tu bandhanabaddhānāṃ maraṇam /
S04bsu019_u:803: yadā bandhanabaddhāḥ kālaṃ kuryāma, tadā kṣatriyadharmamasmākaṃ vinaśyati /
S04bsu019_u:804: yadā saṃgrāmabhūmau kālaṃ kuryāma, tadā svargopagā vayaṃ bhavema //
S04bsu019_u:805: atha te rājānaḥ sarve svakaṃ svakaṃ gṛhaṃ gatāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:807: yadā te rathaṃ sajjīkurvanti mahārhāṇi śastrāṇi,
S04bsu019_u:808: tadā daśarathaputreṇa vāmanakarūpamabhinirmāya mṛgājinenottarya veṇudaṇḍamupagṛhya pīṭhikāmupagṛhya saṃprasthito matsakāśam /
S04bsu019_u:810: dvārapālairanubaddhaḥ - mā praviśa vāmanaka brāhmaṇa iti /
S04bsu019_u:814: atha sa dvārapālapuruṣo gatvā balimārocayati - deva, āgataste vāmanako brāhmaṇaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:815: atha sa balistametadavocat - kīdṛśaṃ vastu yācate?
S04bsu019_u:816: atha sa dvārapālastametadavocat - deva na tamanujānāmi /
S04bsu019_u:817: atha sa balistametadavocat - gacchantu bhavantaḥ, ānīyatāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:822: sa taṃ balimetadavocat - eṣa kālapuruṣo 'vapraviṣṭaḥ, avaśyaṃ te vighāto bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:824: śukra uvāca - jānāmyahaṃ tasya nimittāni cihnāni ca dṛṣṭvā /
S04bsu019_u:826: atha nārāyaṇena vicintya avaśyaṃ dānasya vipratisāraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:827: tena me sarasvatī mukhe nyastā, tadā sa kathayati - āgaccha brāhmaṇa /
S04bsu019_u:828: kīdṛśamabhiprāyo bhavataḥ? sa praviśyaitadavocat - dvipadabhūmī yācayāmi /
S04bsu019_u:829: baliruvāca - yadi tvaṃ brāhmaṇa dvipadaṃ yācase, mayā trīṇi padāni te 'nupradattāni /
S04bsu019_u:830: sa pratigrahaṃ tasyopagṛhya svastimupavadyānugṛhītaṃ tena tilapānīyasuvarṇasahitam /
S04bsu019_u:832: atha śukro balimetadavocat - rājan kathitaṃ mayā kālapuruṣa eṣa praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:833: na ca tvayā pramāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vacanam /
S04bsu019_u:838: atha balirasurendro 'dhomukhaṃ prapatitaḥ smṛtibhraṣṭaḥ tharatharāyamānaḥ sthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:839: kiṃ kṛtya(?) svahastena mayā viṣaṃ bhakṣitam /
S04bsu019_u:842: tadā sa kathayati - tṛtīyasya padaṃ na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu019_u:843: yanmama pratigrahaṃ yācitam, kīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ karomyaham?
S04bsu019_u:844: atha nārāyaṇastametadavocat - yatrāhaṃ sthāpayāmi tatra tvayā sthātavyam /
S04bsu019_u:845: [Vaidya_275] atha sa balirasurendrastametadavocat - yādṛśaṃ tvayājñaptaṃ tādṛśaṃ karomyaham /
S04bsu019_u:846: satyaṃ kuruṣe? sa kathayati - satyaṃ satyaṃ karomyaham /
S04bsu019_u:850: tā api ca kumārikāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kauravairvidhvaṃsitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:851_0: tāni ca suvarṇamayāni siṃhāsanāni divyāni cchatrāṇyupānahāni ratnapariveṣṭitāni ca
S04bsu019_u:851_1: vastrābharaṇāni ca suvarṇaghaṇṭāni suvarṇakaṭakāni ratnakhacitāni kapilāni kauravapāṇḍavairvidhvaṃsitāni /
S04bsu019_u:853: atha sa balirasurendro yajñabhūmerniṣkrāntaḥ śarīracintāmāpede - dātā balirudārayajñamupāsya /
S04bsu019_u:856: yathaiva kartā sartā sa nītvā pātālamupasthāpitaḥ sāntaḥpuraparivāraḥ /
S04bsu019_u:857: ākhyātaṃ hi mayā bhagavan - bhūtapūrvaṃ kurukṣetre mayā dānaṃ dattaṃ tasyaitatkarmaphalamanubhavāmi /
S04bsu019_u:858: tathā trātā bhavāhi me bhagavannātha, na bhūyo duḥkhamāpnuyām //
S04bsu019_u:859: atha balistaṃ bhagavantamāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ stotraviśeṣaiḥ stotumārabdhaḥ - trāṇaṃ bhavāhi śubhapadmahasta /
S04bsu019_u:881: mucyante te kārasūtrai rauravopapanneṣu avīcyupapanneṣu pretanagaropapanneṣu ye tava nāmadheyamanusmaranti /
S04bsu019_u:886_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro balerindrasya vyākaraṇamanuprayacchati sma - bhaviṣyasi tvamasurendra
S04bsu019_u:886_1: śrīrnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu019_u:886_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:888: tatra tava buddhakṣetre na rāgaśabdo na dveṣaśabdo na mohaśabdo bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:891: śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāramupanāmitaṃ maulīkuṇḍalaṃ ca nānāratnasamuccitamupanāmitaṃ ca //
S04bsu019_u:892: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro dharmadeśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - śṛṇu mahārāja /
S04bsu019_u:893: nitye dhruve śāśvate mānuṣyake ye cintayanti satataparigrahaṃ mahābhogānyanuvicintayanti dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyān,
S04bsu019_u:896: ajñānāste sattvā ye putradāradārikāmanuvicintayanti bhāryāṃ mātāpitarau /
S04bsu019_u:899: yadā prāṇoddharaṇaṃ bhavati, tadā jambudvīpaṃ viparītaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu019_u:901: ye ca mahārhā vṛkṣāstān pradīptān saprajvalitānekajvālībhūtān paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:904: tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kṣuradhāropacite mahāpathe pādā viśīryante /
S04bsu019_u:905: utkṣipte pāde ye 'nyāḥ pādāḥ prādurbhavanti, anekaiḥ kākagṛdhraśvānādibhirbhakṣyante /
S04bsu019_u:907: tataḥ kṣuradhāropacitānmahāpathādavatīrya yatra ṣoḍaśāṅgulipramāṇāni kaṇṭakāni tatrānīyate,
S04bsu019_u:908: tata ekaikapāde pañca pañcaśatāni kaṇṭakāni praviśanti /
S04bsu019_u:909: sa cākrandanti - viṣayapāparatena sattvena karma kṛtam //
S04bsu019_u:910: atha te yamapālapuruṣā evamāhuḥ - mārṣāḥ, na tvayā tathāgatasya piṇḍapātraṃ niryātitam /
S04bsu019_u:913: na ca tvayā kvaciddānāni dīyamānāni dṛṣṭvānumoditāni /
S04bsu019_u:914: na ca tvayā kvacit pradeśe stūpabimbāni pradakṣiṇīkṛtāni /
S04bsu019_u:915: sa kathayati - aśrāddho 'bhūvaṃ pāparato buddhadharmasaṃghaparivarjitaḥ pāpamitraparigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitraparivarjitaśca /
S04bsu019_u:918: athe te yamapuruṣā nītvā kālasūtre mahānarake kṣipanti /
S04bsu019_u:919: śikṣā caikaikaśaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati,
S04bsu019_u:920: dvitīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati,
S04bsu019_u:921: tṛtīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati /
S04bsu019_u:922: yadā kalaṃ na kurvanti tadāgnikhadāmadhye kṣipanti /
S04bsu019_u:927: kaṇṭhamapi tālumapi hṛdayamapi yantravatkalā nigaḍāyamānā sarvaṃ taṃ kāyaṃ dahyante /
S04bsu019_u:928: evameva hā rājan na kaścit trātā bhaviṣyati paraloke /
S04bsu019_u:929: tasmāttarhi taṃ mahārāja yatnena puṇyaṃ kartavyam /
S04bsu019_u:930: evaṃ sānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā ca taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha - apramattena bhavitavyam,
S04bsu019_u:936: mamāntikāddharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvato niravaśeṣāṇi pāpaskandhāni na ca supariśuddhāni /
S04bsu019_u:939: tatra ca tava saptaratnamayaṃ padmāsanaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:940_0: yatra ratnapadme niṣadya tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāt
S04bsu019_u:941: śrutvā ca tatraiva vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyase anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu019_u:945_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya ca balerasurendrasya imaṃ sarvadurgatipariśodhanaṃ
S04bsu019_u:945_1: bodhisattvālaṃkārakāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma dharmālokaṃ deśayitvā taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendraṃ
S04bsu019_u:954: tadā te devā nāgā yakṣā rākṣasā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:956_0: atha teṣāṃ bodhisattvenāṃ madhye gaganagañjo nāma bodhisattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu019_u:956_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu019_u:957: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavane viharati,
S04bsu019_u:959: tato 'mī raśmaya āgacchanti, punastasyaiva sakāśaṃ gatāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:960: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kenopāyena paśyeyamahamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam?
S04bsu019_u:962: yadā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkrāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:963: tadā jetavane mahāvihāre divyāni puṣpavarṣāṇi patanti,
S04bsu019_u:968: lohitadaṇḍāni suvarṇarūpyapatrāṇi anekāni puṣpavṛkṣaśatāni anekāni puṣkariṇīśatāni puṣpaparipūrṇāni paramaśobhanīyāni prādurbhūtāni //
S04bsu019_u:969: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nāgacchati bhagavannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:970_0: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra tato balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkamya paramabhīṣaṇīyaṃ
S04bsu019_u:970_1: tamondhakāraṃ nāma pṛthivīpradeśaṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ bhūmiṃ amanuṣyāvacaramapṛthivīpradeśaṃ tatra gacchati /
S04bsu019_u:972: tatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe varado nāma cintāmaṇiratnarājo 'sti /
S04bsu019_u:979: dhāvitvā pādayoḥ praṇipatya saṃbhāṣayanti - mā tvaṃ bhagavan śrāntaklānto yastvaṃ cirakālena dṛṣṭaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:984: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasā divyasuvarṇaratnamayaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prasamayanti tasyāvalokiteśvarasyārthe vicitraiḥ puṣpamayaiḥ saṃchāditam,
S04bsu019_u:986: sa tairyakṣarākṣasairnītvā tatra divyasuvarṇaratnamaye siṃhāsane viśrāmitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:987: tataḥ avalokiteśvarasteṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ dharma deśayati - śṛṇvattu bhavantaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:988: āryakāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ ye śroṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:992: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum,
S04bsu019_u:993: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:994: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā mahāsamudrasyaikamudakabinduṃ gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:995: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:996: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhādvādaśakalpānekasthāne dhārayeyuḥ,
S04bsu019_u:998: te 'pi tathāgatāḥ sarve sahitā bhūtvā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayituṃ na śaknuvanti sma,
S04bsu019_u:1000: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāścaturmahādvīpeṣvekaikadvīpapramāṇaṃ gṛhaṃ vihāraṃ vā kārayeddivyasuvarṇaratnamayam,
S04bsu019_u:1001: tatra gṛhe vihāre vā stūpasahasraṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu019_u:1004: tato bahutaraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandham /
S04bsu019_u:1005: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañca mahānadyo sahasranadīparivārā mahāsamudramupasaṃkrāmanti,
S04bsu019_u:1006: evameva kulaputrā asya kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ puṇyaughapravāhamupapravahati //
S04bsu019_u:1007: atha te yakṣarākṣasā avalokiteśvarametadavocan - ye sattvāḥ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:1009: sa āha - aprameyaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputrāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prabhavati /
S04bsu019_u:1013: te sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ janayanti /
S04bsu019_u:1017: yatra yatropapadyante, tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismarā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:1022: na kadācit yakṣatvaṃ na rākṣasatvaṃ na pretatvaṃ na piśācatvaṃ na pūtanātvaṃ na kaṭapūtanātvaṃ na manuṣyadāridryaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:1023: gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sevāpuṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:1024: ye 'pi kecit kulaputrāḥ sattvā asmāt kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājādekākṣaramapi nāmadheyamapi catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:1025: teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gamiṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:1030: teṣāṃ na kaścit kāye vyādhiḥ prabhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:1031: na cakṣurogaṃ na śrotrarogaṃ na ghrāṇarogaṃ na jihvārogaṃ na kāyarogam /
S04bsu019_u:1034: na mleccheṣu na pāpakuleṣu norabhrikeṣu na kaukkuṭikeṣu na jatyeṣu(?) pratyājāyante /
S04bsu019_u:1036: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ teṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ tamondhakāravāsināṃ sarveṣāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu019_u:1037: te yakṣarākṣasāstāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śubhāṃ śrutvā kecit srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1038: kecit sakṛdāgāmiphale, kecidanāgamiphale, kecidarhattve, kecit prabhutvabodhau pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1039: ato yenāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ kathayanti - ihaiva bhagavan viharasva,
S04bsu019_u:1042: vayaṃ ca tavāntike asminneva tamondhakārabhūmau tavārthāya divyāni sauvarṇamayāni caṃkramaṇāni kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1043: mā bhagavannanyatra pradeśaṃ gacchasva, vayaṃ tavādarśanāt kathaṃ tiṣṭhāmaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:1044: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃśca yakṣarākṣasānetadavocat - anekāni ca mayā kulaputrāḥ sattvāni bodhimārge niyojayitavyāni /
S04bsu019_u:1045: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1046: te parasparamevamāhuḥ - gamiṣyati ayamasmākamavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyataraṃ pṛthivīpradeśam,
S04bsu019_u:1049: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāstamondhakārāyā bhūmyāḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1050: atha te tamondhakāraprativāsino yakṣarākṣasāstasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:1053: te yakṣarākṣasāḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva ca prakrāntāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1062: tatra devanikāyeṣu sukuṇḍalo nāma devaputro daridro duścittaśceti /
S04bsu019_u:1063: atha āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ sa tena brāhmaṇarūpeṇa tasya devaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1064: upasaṃkramya sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ dāridryaduḥkhavyupaśamāya taṃ devaputrametadavocat - bubhukṣito 'haṃ tṛṣitaśceti /
S04bsu019_u:1065: atha sa devaputro rudaṃstaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - na ca me brāhmaṇa kiṃcitsaṃvidyate /
S04bsu019_u:1067: atha sa devaputro vimānaṃ praviśya sarvabhāṇḍaṃ nirabhyavekṣitumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1068: sa ca paripatitaṃ niveśanaṃ divyairmahārhai ratnabhāṇḍaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ dakṣiṇapārśvam,
S04bsu019_u:1069: anyāni ca bhāṇḍāni divyarasarasāgropetairāhāraiḥ paripūrṇāni vāmapārśve vimānasya vastrābharaṇaiḥ sarvapuṣpagandhādibhiḥ paripūrṇāni //
S04bsu019_u:1070: atha sa devaputra etad dṛṣṭaivaṃ cintāmāpede - avaśyamayaṃ sa satpātro dvāre sthito yasya darśanamātreṇāpidṛśī lakṣmīrmamānuprāptā /
S04bsu019_u:1071: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇamāhūyaivamāha - ehi brāhmaṇa, idaṃ vimānaṃ praviśa /
S04bsu019_u:1072: sa ca brāhmaṇastena devaputreṇa vimāne praviśya tairdivyaratnaiḥ pratipāditaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:1076: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - bho brāhmaṇa, katamāyā bhūmyāstvamāgataḥ?
S04bsu019_u:1078: atha sa devaputrastametadavocat - kīdṛśī sā bhūmiḥ?
S04bsu019_u:1079: atha sa brāhmaṇo devaputrametadavocat - tathāgatādhyuṣitā sā bhūmī ramaṇīyā divyamaṇiratnaparikhacitā pariśobhitā /
S04bsu019_u:1083: vividhāśca śīlavanto guṇavanto dakṣiṇīyā dṛśyante viśvabhuvaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1086: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - avaśyaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇa satyaṃ pratyāhāraḥ kartavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1088: na ca manuṣyasyedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati yādṛśaṃ tava nimittaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu019_u:1089: atha sa brāhmaṇastametadavocat - na devaḥ, api tu mānuṣo 'haṃ bodhisattvabhūtaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1092: upanāmayitvā ca sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣita(vān) -
S04bsu019_u:1095: atha sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tatraiva prakrāntaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1101: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ tasmāddevanikāyādavatīrya siṃhaladvīpaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1102: gatvā ca rākṣasīnāṃ purato vyavasthitaḥ kāmarūpamātmānamabhinirmāya prāsādikam /
S04bsu019_u:1103: atha tā rākṣasyo 'nyonyamevamāhuḥ - ayamīdṛśaṃ paramakāmarūpī puruṣo dṛśyate /
S04bsu019_u:1104: atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ kāmacittamutpannam /
S04bsu019_u:1105: tadā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramyaitadavocan - bhavāṃstvaṃ bhajasva asmākaṃ kumārīyauvanam,
S04bsu019_u:1107: tvaṃ ca bho puruṣa, asvāmikānāṃ svāmī bhava /
S04bsu019_u:1113: imāni te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhāni vicitrāṇi śayanāni udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramayāṇi //
S04bsu019_u:1114: sa kathayati - madīyamājñaptaṃ yadi kurute, tatsarvaṃ yuṣmākaṃ yathābhiprāyaṃ kariṣyāmi /
S04bsu019_u:1115: tāśca tamāhuḥ - kathaṃ vayaṃ tavājñāṃ na kariṣyāmaḥ? tena tāsāmāryāṣṭāṅgikamārgamupadarśitam /
S04bsu019_u:1118: atha tā rākṣasyastasyapuruṣasyāntikādāryāṣṭāṅgikamārgaṃ gṛhītvā daśa kuśalāni ca saṃsmarya,
S04bsu019_u:1125: tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ rāgaduḥkhaṃ na bādhate /
S04bsu019_u:1131: evaṃ cāhuḥ - punarapi na prāṇātipātaṃ kurvāmaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1132: yādṛśena jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā jīvanti annena pānena, tādṛśajīvikayā vayaṃ jīvāmaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1135: tādṛśaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaramupagṛhītvā tasyaiva puruṣasya purato 'nimiṣairnayanaiḥ prekṣamāṇāḥ prasthitāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1140: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmātsiṃhaladvīpādavatīrya vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāvasthāne gato yatrānekānyanekāni kṛmikulaśatasahasrāṇi prativasanti /
S04bsu019_u:1141: tato 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva upasaṃkramya tatrāsa tāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā ātmānaṃ bhramararūpamabhinirmāya ghuṇaghuṇāyamāṇam /
S04bsu019_u:1142: tadeṣāṃ śabdaṃ niścārayati - namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṃghāya iti /
S04bsu019_u:1143: tacchrutvā te ca sarve prāṇakāḥ namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāyeti nāmamanusmārayanti /
S04bsu019_u:1144_0: te ca sarve buddhanāmasmaraṇamātreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
S04bsu019_u:1144_1: jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ sugandhamukhā nāma
S04bsu019_u:1145: sarve te bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyāntikādidaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma mahāyānaṃ śrutvā anumodya ca nānādigbhyo vyākaraṇāni pratilabdhāni //
S04bsu019_u:1147: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sattvaparipākaṃ kṛtvā tasyā vārāṇasyā mahānagaryāḥ prakrāntaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1154: yāvat sattvān paśyanti sma parasparaṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇān /
S04bsu019_u:1157: te cāhuḥ - nādyaiva māsaṃbhakṣaṇam, viṃśativarṣāṇi paripūrṇāni kāntārasya ca pratipannasya ca /
S04bsu019_u:1161: atha avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaścintāmāpede - kenopāyenāhaṃ sattvān sarvān sukhopadhānaistasmātkāntārānmahādārūṇādakālamaraṇātparimocayeyaṃ saṃtarpayeyam?
S04bsu019_u:1165: tadā paścāddivyāni piṣṭakāni rasarasāgropetāni tenāhāreṇa paripūrṇāni /
S04bsu019_u:1166: yadāhāreṇa saṃtarpitā bhavanti tadā dhānyavarṣāṇi patanti,
S04bsu019_u:1168: vividhāni ca vastrābharaṇāni ca pravarṣanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:1169: yadā yadā teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ke 'pyabhiprāyā bhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:1171: atha te māgadhakāḥ sattvāstadidaṃ vicitraṃ svātmasukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ ca vyupaśāntam,
S04bsu019_u:1173: te ca sarve ekasthāne viśrāntāḥ, viśramitvā parasparamevamāhuḥ - kasya devasyāyaṃ prabhāvaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:1174: tatasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ madhye jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ kubjo gopāṇasīvakro 'dhibhagno dāṇḍaparāyaṇaḥ anekavarṣaśatasahasrāyuṣikaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1175: sa teṣāṃ madhye sthitvā kathayati - na yuṣmākamanyadevasya kasyacidīdṛśaṃ prabhāvo bhavati virahitādavalokiteśvarasya /
S04bsu019_u:1176: tatastā parṣadaḥ pṛcchanti - kīdṛśaṃ tasya nimittamavalokiteśvarasya?
S04bsu019_u:1177: atha sa puruṣa āryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ bhāṣitumārabdhaḥ -
S04bsu019_u:1187: sukhitāste sattvā loke ye tasya nāmamanusmaranti /
S04bsu019_u:1189: sacetanāste puruṣapuṃgavā ye avalokiteśvarasya satataparigrahaṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ niryātayanti /
S04bsu019_u:1193: aśvaratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu019_u:1194: evaṃ sapta ratnāni, ebhiḥ saptaratnaiḥ samanvāgatā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:1195: ye cāvalokiteśvarasyaikamapi puṣpaṃ niryātayanti, te [Vaidya_283] sugandhikāyā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:1196: yatra yatropapadyante tatra tatra parīpūrṇakāyāśca bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:1200: atha sa jīrṇapurūṣaḥ ānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā svakaṃ gṛhaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1202: atha sa ākāśe cintāmāpede - viśvabhūstathāgato me cirakālaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:1206: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattva āgacchati?
S04bsu019_u:1207: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati /
S04bsu019_u:1209: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vāmapārśve viśrāntaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1210: atha sa punaḥ śrāntaṃ viditvā bhagavān pṛcchati - śrāntastvaṃ kulaputra /
S04bsu019_u:1212: tana tasya bhūtapūrvaṃ varṇitam - sadā preteṣvavīcyupapanneṣu kālasūtrarauravopapanneṣu hāhe tapane mahānarake,
S04bsu019_u:1216: eṣu mahānarakeṣu ye sattvā upapannāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiḥ sattvānāmaparipākakṛtā kartavyā,
S04bsu019_u:1219: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramavismayamāpannaḥ - na ca me bodhisattvabhūtasya īdṛśaṃ viṣayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śruta vā,
S04bsu019_u:1221: athe gaganagañjo bodhisattvo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ sthitvā avalokiteśvaramevamāha - mā tvaṃ śrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1223: sa āha - na cāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ madhye śrānto na kliṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1224: tau parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitau //
S04bsu019_u:1225: atha bhagavān ṣaṭpāramitānirdeśaṃ dharmaṃ deśayitumārabdhaḥ - śṛṇvantu kulaputrāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1229: imāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1231: te ca bodhisattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu prakrāntāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1232: ayaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya prathamo nirvyūhaḥ sarvakarmaviśodhano 'nuttarabodhimārgapratiṣṭhāpakaḥ samāptaḥ // 1 //
S04bsu019_u:1239: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - ākhyāhi bhagavan avalokiteśvarasya bhūtapurvaṃ kṛtamete samādhayaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:1244: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha - nirdeśaya bhagavaṃstāni samādhīni sarvasattvānukampayā /
S04bsu019_u:1245: bhagavānāha - tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ākārakaro nāma samādhiḥ,
S04bsu019_u:1307: ebhiṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samādhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1310: īdṛśastathāgatānāṃ puṇyasaṃbhāro na saṃvidyate, prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtasya //
S04bsu019_u:1312: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra ahaṃ siṃhalarājo nāma bodhisattvabhūto 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:1314: pañcabhirvaṇikputraśataiḥ sārdhaṃ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭharairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhādibhiḥ prabhūtaṃ paṇyamāropya siṃhaladvīpaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1317: tadā me karṇadhārā āhuḥ - kathaya kathaya yuṣmākaṃ katamadvīpeṣu gamanāyedṛśā vāyavo vānti?
S04bsu019_u:1318: athavā ratnadvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti, athavā rākṣasadvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti?
S04bsu019_u:1319: atha karṇadhāra evamāha - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt - siṃhaladvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti /
S04bsu019_u:1321: tato 'haṃ siṃhaladvīpanivāsinībhī rākṣasībhiḥ saṃprasthito viditvā akālavāyava utsṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1323: te ca vaṇikpuruṣā udake patitā bāhubalena saṃtartumārabdhāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1325: tato rākṣasīnāṃ pañca śatāni niṣkrāntāni kilakilāyamānāni /
S04bsu019_u:1328: te ca svakīyāni vastrāṇi śarīre lagnāni gṛhītvā niṣpīḍitumārabdhāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1329: niṣpīḍayitvā te tasmātsthānādatikramya anyapradeśe mahataścampakavṛkṣasya tale viśrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1330: viśramitvā parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ - ko 'smākamupāyaḥ saṃvidyate?
S04bsu019_u:1333: atha teṣāṃ rākṣasyaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ purataḥ sthitvaivamāhuḥ - svāgatam /
S04bsu019_u:1337: anālayanānāṃ aparāyaṇānāṃ ālayo bhava, parāyaṇo bhava /
S04bsu019_u:1338: imāni te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi yānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi kaṭakakeyūrāṇāṃ maulikuṇḍalānāṃ gṛhāṇi udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramaṇīyāni saṃtiṣṭhanti /
S04bsu019_u:1339: tābhī rākṣasībhirekaikaṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā svakaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgatāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1341: tayāhaṃ svakīyaṃ niveśanaṃ nītvā divyarasasāgropetenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1343: sa tu tato mānuṣyakena saukhyena saṃtarpitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1347: na kadācitsyānmayā dṛṣṭaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā prajvalitameva ratikarahasanam,
S04bsu019_u:1348: tadaiva mayā tasya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ hasase?
S04bsu019_u:1351: tadā me tasya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - tvaṃ jānāsi rākṣasīti?
S04bsu019_u:1352: sa kathayati - yadi na pratīyasi, dakṣiṇapanthalikāṃ gṛhītvā anuvicaran gaccha /
S04bsu019_u:1355: anye ca jīvanto anye ca mṛtāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1356: yadi na pratīyasi, tadapi mārgaṃ gaccha /
S04bsu019_u:1357: gatvā ca mārgaṃ nirīkṣasva, tadā me śraddhāsyasi /
S04bsu019_u:1358: tadā tasyāstena mohajālā nāma nidrāti sā //
S04bsu019_u:1360: atha sa bodhisattvo rātriprathamayāme samaye tasyā rākṣasyāḥ sakāśādutthāya saṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1365: atha tasminnāyase nagare mahān yaścampakavṛkṣastatraivāruhya tato mayā teṣāmutkāsanaśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1366: tato me vaṇikpuruṣāḥ kathayanti - yatkhalu mahāsārthavāho jānīyāt - vayaṃ rākṣasībhirāyase nagare prakṣiptāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1367: tadā dine dine śataṃ puruṣāṇāṃ gṛhītvā bhakṣayanti /
S04bsu019_u:1370: tadāhaṃ campakavṛkṣādavatīrya punareva dakṣiṇāṃ panthalikāṃ gṛhītvā anuvicaran tvarita āgacchāmi sma / tato praviṣṭaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1371: atha ratikaro māmetadavocat - dṛṣṭaste sārthavāha madvacanam?
S04bsu019_u:1372: uktaṃ ca mayā - dṛṣṭaṃ yuṣmākaṃ satyaṃ sāṃkathyakṛtam /
S04bsu019_u:1373: tadā me 'sya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - satyameva, ka upāyo 'smākam?
S04bsu019_u:1374: atha sa ratikara etadavocat - asti me mahāsārthavāhopāyam,
S04bsu019_u:1377: atha sa ratikaro māmetadavocat - asti tasminneva dvīpe mahāsamudratīre devabālāho nāmāśvarājo hīnadīnānukampakaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1379: sarvaśvetānāmauṣadhīṃ bhuktvā suvarṇavālukāsthale āvartanaparivartanasaṃparivartanaṃ kṛtvā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayati,
S04bsu019_u:1383: evaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā sā rākṣasī samīpamupagamya sārdhaṃ śayita eva prativibuddhā /
S04bsu019_u:1384: sā kathayati - āryaputra, kathaṃ te śarīraṃ śītalam? tadā mayā tasyā mṛṣāvādaṃ pratyāhāraṃ kṛtam /
S04bsu019_u:1385: bahirnagarasya uccāraprasraveṇa niṣkrānto 'ham, tataḥ śarīraṃ śītalam /
S04bsu019_u:1387: tataḥ prātaḥ sūryasya cābhyudgamanakālasamaye utthāya teṣāṃ vaṇikpurūṣāṇāmārocayati sma - āgacchantu bhavanto bahirnagarasya gacchāmaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1388: te sarve sahitāḥ samagrā bahirnagarasya saṃprasthitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1389: te ca bahirnagarasya gatvā ekānte viśrāntāḥ sāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ - kasya kīdṛśī bhāryā snehavatī?
S04bsu019_u:1397: tadā teṣāṃ vaṇikpuruṣāṇāṃ pratyāhāraṃ karoti sma - na yuṣmākaṃ yuktamidaṃ yadvayaṃ rākṣasībhiḥ prasaktāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1398: iti śrutvā te vihvalībhūtāḥ evamāhuḥ - satyaṃ mahāsārthavāha, rākṣasī siṃhaladvīpanivāsinīti /
S04bsu019_u:1399: tadā teṣāṃ mayā pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - satyaṃ satyaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghebhyaṃ, neyaṃ mānuṣī, rākṣasī /
S04bsu019_u:1400: atha te vaṇikpuruṣāḥ kathayanti - kāsmākaṃ gatiḥ?
S04bsu019_u:1402: tadā teṣāṃ mayā pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - asmākaṃ gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam?
S04bsu019_u:1404: atha sa teṣāmevamāha - asti yuṣmākaṃ siṃhaladvīpe bālāho nāma aśvarājaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1407: kṛtvā ca śarīraṃ pracchoḍayitvā vāṇīṃ pratyāharediti - kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmīti /
S04bsu019_u:1409: atha te vaṇikpurūṣā ūcuḥ - katame dine gacchāmo vayam?
S04bsu019_u:1410: sa pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - tṛtīye divase 'vaśyaṃ gantavyam /
S04bsu019_u:1412: te kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā punareva tannagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ svakasvakaṃ niveśanamupagatā /
S04bsu019_u:1415: sa kathayati - na ca te kiṃcid dṛṣṭam /
S04bsu019_u:1416: atha sā rākṣasī tametadavocat - santi āryaputra vividhānyasmin siṃhaladvīpe udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni vividhavicitrapuṣpaparipūrṇāni /
S04bsu019_u:1418: sa pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - tṛtīye divase gamiṣyāmītyataḥ saṃbalaṃ kartavyam /
S04bsu019_u:1420: tāni ca vividhāni puṣkariṇīśatāni ramaṇīyāni udyānaśatāni puṣpaparipūrṇāni paśyāmi /
S04bsu019_u:1421: tāni ca vividhāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā āgamiṣyāmi /
S04bsu019_u:1425: (?) atha rākṣasyo jānanti yogaṃ tenāsmākaṃ (?) jīvitāntarāyaṃ kariṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:1429: sā kathayati rākṣasī - āryaputra kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ucchvāsaṃ choritam?
S04bsu019_u:1430: atha sa tāmetadavocat - svadeśābhiratā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1431: sā āha - kiṃ karoṣyāryaputra svakīyena viṣayena?
S04bsu019_u:1432: asminneva siṃhaladvīpe vividhānyannagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhānyudyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni /
S04bsu019_u:1437: tṛtīye divase pratyūṣakālasamaye sarve te saṃprasthitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1440: na punaḥ kenacit punareva siṃhaladvīpo nirīkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1442: īdṛśaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā saṃprasthitāḥ tvaritaṃ tvaritameva laghu laghveva gacchanti /
S04bsu019_u:1448: yadā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayati tadā siṃhaladvīpaṃ calati sma /
S04bsu019_u:1449: trīṇi vākyāni pratyāharati sma - kaḥ pāragāmī, kaḥ pāragāmī, kaḥ pāragāmīti?
S04bsu019_u:1451: yadā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayāmi, na tadā yuṣmākaṃ kenacitsiṃhaladvīpo nirīkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1455: yadā te ārūḍhāḥ tadā siṃhaladvīpanivāsinyo rākṣasyaḥ kilakilāyamānāḥ pṛṣṭhato dhāvanti sma rudantyaḥ karuṇakaruṇairvilāpaiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1459: yadā te udake patitāḥ, tadā rākṣasya utkṣipya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:1461: tadā tīrasya samīpe bālāhamaśvarājaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1464: tadā me mātāpitārau kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya roditumārabdhau /
S04bsu019_u:1469: tatastau mātāpitarau kathayataḥ sma - jīvaṃstu putra tvamanuprāptaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1471: jarākāle yaṣṭibhūto 'ndhakāre mārgasyopadarśakaḥ, maraṇakāle piṇḍadātā, mṛtasya sanāthīkaraṇīyam /
S04bsu019_u:1472: yathā śītalo vāto nāma putra āhlādakaraḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1475: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin bālāhakaṃ tamaśvarājabhūtenāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tādṛśādahaṃ mṛtyubhayātparimokṣitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1476: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin na śaknomyavalokiteśvarasya puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:1482: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇāviṣkambhin suvarṇaṃ nāma romavivaram /
S04bsu019_u:1484: tena ca saṃsārikena duḥkhena na bādhyante /

S04bsu019_u:2189: pṛcchatyalpābādhatāṃ ca alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca /
S04bsu019_u:2192: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantametadavocat - labheyāhaṃ bhagavan vyākaraṇanirdeśasya samuddeśam?
S04bsu019_u:2193: bhagavānāha - [Vaidya_304] gaccha kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaste vyākaraṇaṃ dāsyati /
S04bsu019_u:2194: atha maheśvaro devaputro 'valokiteśvarasya pādayornipatya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ -
S04bsu019_u:2195: namostvalokiteśvarāya maheśvarāya padmadharāya padmāsanāya padmapriyāya śubhapadmahastāya padmaśriye parivṛtāya jagadāsvādanakarāya pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya prahlādanakarāya //
S04bsu019_u:2196: evaṃ maheśvaro devaputro gatvā avalokiteśvarasya stotraviśeṣaṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2197: atha avalokiteśvarastametadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:2198: atha maheśvaro devaputrastametadavocat - dadasva me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu019_u:2199_0: avalokiteśvarastametadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra vivṛtāyāṃ lokadhātau bhasmeśvaro
S04bsu019_u:2199_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu019_u:2199_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:2200: atha sā umādevyupasaṃkramyāvalokiteśvarasya pādau śirasā vanditvā avalokiteśvarasya stotrābhidhānaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ -
S04bsu019_u:2201: namo 'stvalokiteśvarāya meheśvarāya prāṇaṃdadāya pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya śubhapadmaśriye parivṛtāya nirvāṇabhūmisaṃprasthitāya sucetanakarāya dharmadharāya //
S04bsu019_u:2202: evaṃ sā umādevī stotrābhidhānaṃ kṛtvā avalokiteśvarasya pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhā -
S04bsu019_u:2205_0: athāvalokiteśvarastāmetadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ bhagini umeśvaro nāma tathāgato
S04bsu019_u:2205_2: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:2206: himavataḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇe pārśve tava lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:2209: vyākṛtā umādevī avalokiteśveraṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarve te 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
S04bsu019_u:2210: ayaṃ kulaputra maheśvaranirvyūho nāma khyāta iti //
S04bsu019_u:2220: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī punareva bhagavantametadavocat - adyāsmākaṃ bhagavan deśaya tvamavalokiteśvarasya guṇaviśeṣam //
S04bsu019_u:2221: bhagavānāha - tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin cakravālamahācakravālau parvatarājānau /
S04bsu019_u:2234_0: eteṣu parvatarājeṣvekaikaṃ lokadhātuṣu śakyate mayā parvatarājānāṃ palāni vā palaśatāni
S04bsu019_u:2234_1: vā palasahasrāṇi vā palakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi vā saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi
S04bsu019_u:2235: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:2236: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgṛhītum,
S04bsu019_u:2237: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:2238: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā mahāsamudrasyaikaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:2239: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:2240: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikāni patrāṇi gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:2241: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum //
S04bsu019_u:2242: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājo bhūryarāśirbhavet /
S04bsu019_u:2244: caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ sarve te lekhakā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2248_0: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dvādaśa gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ
S04bsu019_u:2251: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin avalokiteśvaraḥ anekaiḥ samādhiśataiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2291_0: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra krakucchando nāma tathāgato
S04bsu019_u:2291_1: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
S04bsu019_u:2291_2: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:2292: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:2293: tadā etasya tathāgatasya puraḥ sthitvā īdṛśamavalokiteśvarasamantabhadrayoḥ samādhivigraho mayā dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2295: yadā samantabhadro bodhisattvo vajrodgataṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:2299: yadā samantabhadro vicchuritaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:2301: yadā samantabhadra ākārakaraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:2303: yadā samantabhadro bhadrarājaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:2304: tadā avalokiteśvaraḥ sāgaragambhīraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede /
S04bsu019_u:2305: yadā samantabhadraḥ siṃhaviṣkambhitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:2307: yadā samantabhadro varadāyakaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
S04bsu019_u:2310: tadā samantabhadrastametadavocat - sādhu sādhvavalokiteśvara, yastvamīdṛśaṃ pratibhānavān /
S04bsu019_u:2311: atha krakucchandastathāgatastametadavocat - alpaṃ tvayā kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya pratibhānaṃ dṛṣṭam /
S04bsu019_u:2312: yādṛśamavalokiteśvarasya pratibhānaṃ tādṛśaṃ tathāgatānāṃ na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu019_u:2313: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra krakucchandasya tathāgatasya sakāśācchrutam //
S04bsu019_u:2314: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavān kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ yena vayaṃ dharmarasenāpūryamāṇāḥ saṃtṛptāḥ bhavema /
S04bsu019_u:2315: bhagavānāha - ye kulaputra kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāma śroṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:2319: īdṛśānāṃ pāparatānāṃ sattvānāṃ tadapi kāraṇḍavyūho mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ sarvapāpaparimokṣaṇaṃ kurute //
S04bsu019_u:2320: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ jānāmyahaṃ bhagavan kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpaparimokṣaṇaṃ kurute?
S04bsu019_u:2321: bhagavānāha - asti kulaputra sumeroḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇapārśve saptabhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairmalanirmalau tīrthau parikalpitau /
S04bsu019_u:2323: yathā pāṇḍulavastraṃ nīlamanugacchanti, sa pāparāśiriva draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2324: evameva kulaputra idaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpāni dahati /
S04bsu019_u:2326: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin varṣākālasamaye sarvāṇi tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ sarve nīlābhi(rūpā) bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:2327: atha śatamukho nāma nāgarājaḥ bhavanādavatīrya sarvāstā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīrdahati /
S04bsu019_u:2328: evamevāyaṃ kulaputraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpāni dahati, śuklabhāvaṃ kurute /
S04bsu019_u:2330: ya imaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraṃ ratnarājaṃ [Vaidya_307] śroṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:2331: na te kulaputra pṛthagjanā iti vaktavyāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2333: teṣāṃ ca maraṇakāraṇasamaye dvādaśa tathāgatā upasaṃkramya āśvāsayanti - mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra /
S04bsu019_u:2340: evaṃ kulaputra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sukhamaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:2341: athāvalokiteśvaro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2343: ta ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garūḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ prakrāntāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:2344: yadā te prakrāntāstadāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavānasmākaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaram /
S04bsu019_u:2348: mārocayitavyaṃ śuddhayate bhadanta nānāvāsaṃ na ca yatra nānāvāse 'sthīni saṃvidyante /
S04bsu019_u:2354: kiṃ bahunā? bhikṣavo duḥśīlena bhikṣuṇā nānāvāsaṃ na kartavyam, prāgeva jñapticaturtham /
S04bsu019_u:2356: duḥśīlānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyāṇāṃ madhye āvāso na dātavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2361: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - katame kāle bhagavannīdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti?
S04bsu019_u:2362: bhagavānāha - tṛtīye varṣaśatagate mama parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya īdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:2365: te sāṃghikaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vaṃśikopabimbopadhānakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ asatparibhogena paribhokṣyante /
S04bsu019_u:2366: ye ca sāṃghikopacāre uccāraṃ prasrāvaṃ kurvanti,
S04bsu019_u:2367: te vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāve gūḍhamṛttikodare prāṇino jāyante /
S04bsu019_u:2368: ye sāṃghikaṃ dantakāṣṭhamasatparibhogena paribhuñjante, te kūrmamakaramatsyeṣu jāyante /
S04bsu019_u:2371: hīnendriyā dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthipatravaducchritaiḥ svakeśaromapraticchannaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīchidropamamukhaiḥ kāye īdṛśaṃ te duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:2372: ye sāṃghikasyānnapānāderanyāyena paribhogaṃ kurvanti, te 'lpaśruteṣu kuleṣu jāyante /
S04bsu019_u:2378: svakīyalomasaṃkucitakāyā uttiṣṭhanti, tadā māṃsapiṇḍā bhūmau patanti /
S04bsu019_u:2380: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:2381: ye sāṃghikīṃ bhūmimasatparibhogena paribhuñjante, te dvādaśa kalpān raurave mahānarake upapadyante /
S04bsu019_u:2386: anyānyapi sarveṇa sarvaṃ dahyante, avaśeṣaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu019_u:2387: tadā bhikṣavaḥ karmavāyavo vānti yena te mṛtāḥ purūṣāḥ punareva jīvanti /
S04bsu019_u:2389: tataḥ teṣāṃ karmopagānāṃ karmavaśānāṃ mahatī jihvā prādurbhavati /
S04bsu019_u:2391: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:2393: tataste yamapālapuruṣā gṛhītvā ca tasya jihvāyāṃ sūcīśatasahasraṃ vidhyanti /
S04bsu019_u:2394: tadapi karmavaśājjīvanti, tata utkṣipya agnikhadāmadhye kṣipanti /
S04bsu019_u:2398: evaṃ parikramatāṃ teṣāṃ trayaḥ kalpāḥ parīkṣīyante /
S04bsu019_u:2401: ye bhikṣavaḥ śikṣāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtāśca bhavanti, taiḥ imāni trīṇi cīvarāṇi dhārayitavyāni /
S04bsu019_u:2406: ye śīlavanto guaṇavantaḥ prajñāvantastairbhikṣava imāni śikṣāpadāni mayā prajñaptāni dhārayitavyāni /
S04bsu019_u:2407: asatparibhogena bhikṣavo na paribhoktavyaṃ sāṃghikaṃ vastu agnighaṭopamam /
S04bsu019_u:2411: viṣasya pratīkāraṃ kartuṃ śakyate, na tu sāṃghikasya vastunaḥ pratikāraṃ kartuṃ śakyate //
S04bsu019_u:2419: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2420: atha te mahāśrāvakāḥ svakaṃ svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2421: te ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ, sarve te prakrāntāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:2424: te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
S04bsu019_u:2428: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu019_u:2429: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
